name: Flipbook Animator GIF
description:
Select all your frames then animate it. You can change the speed of your animation or make it reversed. Lastly, you can export your animation to GIF file.


- Live Preview

See your changes of your animation in real-time


- Change speed

Tweak your animation speed with a slider


- Reversed animation

Reverse your animation from last frame to first frame


- Secure

Flipbook stores your GIF data on your machine. None of your content is saved on the cloud.


- Export to GIF

Save your animation to a GIF file


Pro features:

- No Watermark

Your design will be 100% yours without watermark


- Onion Skin

Display frame skin to inspect your animation


- Shortcut Button

Open plugin from your frame


Upgrade to Pro: https://gumroad.com/l/Dnxyh
